item.title: Risk Based Windows 11 Feature Update Deployment - Reporting
item.description: With Windows 10 support coming to an end sooner than you’d expect, in the first part of this series we look at ways to capture Feature Update Readiness Report data using PowerShell and Graph to help with the rollout of the new Windows 11 operating system.
